channel.title: Teleblock
channel.description: hey on my server much people always are pking like ghorock or at varrock lvl 1-5 or something, and they keep teleing away.. even when they are tbed (Teleblocked) they can still tele to varrock falador but if you try to tele again then it says you are teleblocked... i want it that he cant tele 1 time just cant tele when he is teleblocked, Thanks :)

item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:

i cant even find teleport for varrock or falador…
maybe someone can come to my server and check
eerbeekpkz.no-ip.org

item.title: Teleblock
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Silver Lining:

Dude. Where is your light? Grab and go, ya know? It’s like a timebomb in an almond. Strange ticking and eatings, then boom! hydrochloric acid is EVERYWHERE. And I speak not of little flashes. I mean a fucking boom. Boom. Like, BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM. Resounding through all the craters of your soul. It’s more intense than you’ll ever be able to imagine without experiencing. Then, BAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAADABAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAABADM. Aftershock. You’re so fucked up at this point that you’re exploding. Literally exploding. Bang bang, boom boom, you’re being destroyed. Finally, you find your light, and you ride it. You ride it like a bitch on a carousel. You boom. You bring. You scream at the light to stop, but it’s not stopping and you can’t let go now. You’ve gone too far. BAM. You’re vaporized but not dead. You fall through every bit of the earth and absorb it like an open chakra in a well-trained body. Then you realize this energy hurts. But it’s too late. You have become Caradharas, and there’s no turning back. You are, and that’s all that matters to you now.

omg, its sir spamalot!

Read full topic
